Hero.description: A free, open-source, and powerful landing page boilerplate, ideal for various projects, enabling you to create a landing page in under an hour.

slides.title: Effortless Carry, Always Fashionable
slides.description: Carry your little one with confidence, wherever you go. Our baby carrier blends modern style and ergonomic comfort, so you and your baby always feel at ease.

slides.title: Designed for You & Your Baby
slides.description: Experience freedom and closeness. Our carriers support healthy development and let you stay stylish on every adventure—big or small.

slides.title: Wherever You Go, Stay Stylish & Comfortable
slides.description: From city strolls to family trips, our carriers are your perfect companion. Move with ease, bond with love.

Benefits.title: Why Choose Our Carriers?
Benefits.subtitle: Discover the perfect balance of comfort, safety, and style—crafted for both you and your little one.

items.title: Ergonomic Support
items.description: Thoughtfully engineered to nurture healthy hip and spine development, while keeping you comfortable on every journey.

items.title: Versatile Carrying Options
items.description: Easily switch between multiple positions to match your baby's needs—from cozy newborn snuggles to curious toddler adventures.

items.title: Premium, Gentle Materials
items.description: Made from soft, breathable fabrics that are kind to your baby's skin and built to last through every moment.

items.title: Safety You Can Trust
items.description: Tested and certified for peace of mind, so you can focus on making memories together.

Guide.title: How to Use Our Carriers
Guide.subtitle: Enjoy safe, comfortable babywearing in just a few easy steps.

steps.title: 1. Pick Your Favorite Color
steps.description: Select the color that matches your style and mood.

steps.title: 2. Adjust for a Custom Fit
steps.description: Easily fine-tune the straps and buckles to ensure both you and your baby feel secure and comfortable.

steps.title: 3. Position with Care
steps.description: Follow our simple guidelines to keep your baby safe, supported, and close to your heart.

steps.title: 4. Cherish Every Moment
steps.description: Stay hands-free and connected—enjoy every adventure together, big or small.

Reviews.title: What Parents Say
Reviews.subtitle: Real experiences from parents who love our carriers.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.content: This carrier has truly changed my daily routine. The back support is amazing, and my baby feels so happy and secure being close to me.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.content: I was new to babywearing, but this carrier made it easy. The fit is perfect for both me and my wife, and our baby loves it too.

reviews.name: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.content: As a pediatrician, I value how this carrier supports healthy hip development. I confidently recommend it to other parents.

reviews.name: David Thompson
reviews.content: We love exploring outdoors with our baby. The thoughtful features like storage pockets and sun shade make every adventure easier.

Catalog.title: Our Collection
Catalog.subtitle: Discover our complete range of baby carriers, designed for comfort, safety, and style. Each product is carefully crafted to provide the best experience for both parent and child.
